Quotations.ab: Nērang ī Pēšāg, ms. TD2 pp.422-423 (original numbering):
pas ēw-bār dast ul sag nihišn yōjdahrgar pušt abāg (wʾʾtl) ud war nēmag-rōz kunišn yaϑā ahū vairiiō 1 ud kə̄mnā mazdā tā astuuaitīš aṣ̌ahe pad apāxəδra ēw-bār abāg sag bē maγ ī didīgar šawišn.

After he puts once the hand over the dog, the purifier must make the progection with the wʾʾtl and the ordeal of the half-day. yaϑā ahū vairiiō 1 and kə̄mnā mazdā until astuuaitīš aṣ̌ahe (and) at apāxəδra he must go once with the dog to the second pit.
